item.title: Tools
item.description: Software TickTick serves as my to-do list x habit tracker x pomodoro timer Learning Obsidian to capture my thoughts Still using [Notion] from time to time mainly for its tables and collaboration features StayFocusd and Forest have helped me to be indistractable one sec and Opal have also helped me tremendously in reducing my phone’s social media and screen time consumption Hardware I use the latest MacBook Pro with Intel as my daily driver This Samsung 27-inch monitor is my first external monitor and I have been loving it I type and scroll with Logitech Keyboard and Mouse set.
